title: The Secret love of Sandra Blain
creator_contributor_role: Los Angeles County Board of Supervisors, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcoholism
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Alcoholism - Study and teaching
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcoholism - Treatment
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse - Alcohol
description: The step by step progression into alcoholism of a wife and mother is shown as Sandra Blain deceives her friends, family, physician and herself. The film focuses attention on the facilities and treatments available for the successful treatment and recovery of victims of the disease of alcoholism.
